pull.title: ci: update GitHub Actions versions
pull.body:
This PR updates outdated GitHub Action versions to ensure compatibility and improve functionality. The following changes are made to the GitHub Actions:
- `actions/upload-artifact` updated from v4 to v6
- `actions/cache` updated from v4 to v5
- `actions/download-artifact` updated from v5 to v7

The updates are necessary to support newer environments and features, and ensure consistent behavior across different workflows. The changes will be tested in the CI pipeline of the pull request.

events.message: chore: Update outdated GitHub Actions versions

events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Code Coverage & Benchmarks For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/34344. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34344#issuecomment-3773259475) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.

> The updates are necessary to support newer environments and features, and ensure consistent behavior across different workflows. The changes will be tested in the CI pipeline of the pull request.

Can you detail why these changes are necessary? Looks to me like these actions are working fine. Are any EoL?

> Can you detail why these changes are necessary? Looks to me like these actions are working fine. Are any EoL?

These changes are not "necessary" in the sense that the existing action version are EoL. But these changes will become necessary in the future as actions migrate the Node runtime they are running on. All the actions updated here use Node 24.0 so it's only a matter of time before the older actions use a Node version that is not automatically available on the machine you are using.

rename.from: chore: Update outdated GitHub Actions versions

events.body: Backported to 30.x in #34283, 29.x in #34446 and 28.x in #34463.
